skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: smart forum
Developer Terms of Use
des: Smart Forum is designed to provide audio recording of specific topic to registered team members. When the skill is first time used, the user can provide their phone number, so that the administrator can check if they are allowed to listed to the class recordings.
